channel.title: Post links to commercial samples here!
channel.description:
I’ll kick this off-
sounds.com, operated by Native Instruments, seems like a good resource. NI have years in the industry, years and years, and I suspect all of these sound sets are also compatible with their other sampling / sample based products.
EDIT: I just remembered this site is NOT yet available in all territories, it’s still in beta. I can’t imagine it will take NI very long to get it together :slight_smile:

Puremagnetik

Microtron XL | The Ultimate Mellotron Compendium

Dive into the haunting, tape saturated choirs, brass and strings of the 1960s. Microtron XL for Ableton Live, Kontakt & Logic bundles together all 3 tapes from Puremagnetik’s popular Microtron series.

Price: USD 39.00

$39.00 $9.99 Sale

Valid until (including) Saturday 28th April.

item.description:
The email during the week said ‘this week’. Didn’t give a specific closing date.

You’re likely to be ok, as it’s much more likely that, as it’s still on today, they’ll keep it up for the rest of the weekend.

(This is not a guarantee.)

item.title: Post links to commercial samples here!
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
This why I mentioned having a good Mk 1 pack. While I agree that Vintage Keys was likely an attempt at it, it lacks a lot of the breadth that makes the Rhodes so great and so alluring.

Problem is, there are so few users discerning enough to give a sh*t, that another attempt at something Rhodes-like, is probably waaay down any list.

Read full topic

item.title: Post links to commercial samples here!
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
akabillposters:

I like Auxy’s Vintage Keys pack, but it lacks real range and texture, imo.

I actually noticed this a few months ago. The Vintage Keys pack doesn’t have any real classic Rhodes instrument. They sound more Wurly to me.

item.title: Post links to commercial samples here!
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
All the packs are available for Ableton Live, Kontakt and Logic.
You have access to all of them when you purchase, and you just download whichever one for your preferred DAW.

Each DAW pack also contains all the RAW samples.

(Screenshot)

Read full topic

item.source: Post links to commercial samples here!

item.title: Post links to commercial samples here!
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Did you grab this’ll? The offer’s still on.

Lots of great stuff in there. It’ll make me get my Ableton on again, to get the best out of them, but I’m also interested to see how using these Rhodes Mk 1 & 2 within Auxy changes my sound.

I like Auxy’s Vintage Keys pack, but it lacks real range and texture, imo.
These PreMagnetik packs sound juicy, imo.

Heck, for $20, it’s worth taking a punt.
You’ve got a couple of Rhodes, a bunch of Mellotron, and a bunch of other stuff, including a couple of your beloved Clavs…

Read full topic

item.title: Post links to commercial samples here!
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Just grabbing this one as I type…
(Heads up to @DHO, also)

Puremagnetik

Keyboard Instruments for Ableton Live, Kontakt & Logic

Concert pianos, vintage Fender Rhodes, Mellotrons, Clavinets and everything in between. Puremagnetik's Keyboard Compendium puts all the originals at your fingertips in this collection of classic instruments. Get 13 Packs and over 5GB of sounds with...

 
13 volumes of PureMagnetik’s keyboard sample packs, available for $19.99 (usually $139) for this week.

Set up for use in Ableton, Logic and Kontakt, but the raw multi-sample WAVs can work well in Auxy too.

Read full topic

item.description:
Puremagnetik

Analog Bass Compendium | A Showcase of Legendary Synth Bass

Legendary bass sounds from classic synthesizers. Includes thousands of samples in Ableton Live Pack, Kontakt and Logic instrument formats.

Price: USD 49.00

4 volumes of PureMagnetik’s Analog Bass sound packs, available for $9.99 (usually $50) for this weekend.

Set up for use in Ableton, Logic and Kontakt, but the raw multi-sample WAVs can work well in Auxy too.
